admin_templates.template:
<xen:if is="!{xen:property gen_fixedHeader}">
	.NoTouch #header {
		position: relative !important;
	}
	
	.NoTouch #contentContainer {
		top: 0;
	}
	
	.NoTouch #body {
		padding-top: 0;
	}
	
	.NoTouch #sideNav.unFix {
		position: relative !important;
	}
</xen:if>

.transmogrifier
{
	transform: rotate(180deg);
}

{xen:phrase add_on}: {xen:if $addOnSelected, {$addOns.{$addOnSelected}.title}, '({xen:phrase unspecified})'}

{xen:phrase add_on}

  • ({xen:phrase unspecified})
  • {$addOn.title}
    •

{xen:phrase reset}

{$property.description}

modification.description: Adds options to add-on list controls.
modification.replace: ${1} <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/admin-style-properties', $addOn}" displayif="{$canAccessDevelopment}">{xen:phrase admin_style_properties}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/admin-template-mods', $addOn}" displayif="{$canAccessDevelopment}">{xen:phrase admin_template_modifications}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/admin-templates', $addOn}" displayif="{$canAccessDevelopment}">{xen:phrase admin_templates}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/phrases', $addOn}">{xen:phrase phrases}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/style-properties', $addOn}">{xen:phrase style_properties}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/template-modifications', $addOn}">{xen:phrase template_modifications}</xen:link> <xen:link href="{xen:adminlink 'add-ons/templates', $addOn}">{xen:phrase templates}</xen:link> ${2}

modification.description: Adds top chooser to admin style property list.
Adds top chooser to admin template list.
Adds template edit javascript to template modification editor.
modification.replace:
<xen:require css="template_edit.css" />
<xen:require js="js/xenforo/template_edit.js" />
<xen:require js="js/genesis/template_edit.js" />
${1} id="templateEditor"${2}PrimaryTemplateOnly ${3} id="templateTextarea"${4}
<input type="hidden" id="templateTitleOriginal" />
${5}

modification.description: Adds top chooser to template modification list.

modification.replace:
<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_fixedHeader}">
	<script>
	   jQuery(document).ready(function($){
	      function scrollIfAnchor(href) {
	         href = typeof(href) == "string" ? href : $(this).attr("href");
	         if(!href) return;
	         var fromTop = $('#content').offset().top;
	         var $target = $(href);
	         if($target.length) {
	            $('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: $target.offset().top - fromTop });
	         }
	      }    
	
	      scrollIfAnchor(window.location.hash);
	      $("body").on("click", "a[href^='#']", scrollIfAnchor);
	   });
	</script>
<xen:else />
	<script>
	   jQuery(document).ready(function($){
	      $(window).bind('scroll', function() {
	         var navHeight = ($(window).scrollTop());
	         if (navHeight > $('#header').outerHeight()) {
	            $('#sideNav').removeClass('unFix');
                    $('#sideNav').css('margin-top', "-" + $('#header').outerHeight() + "px");
	         } else {
	            $('#sideNav').addClass('unFix');
                    $('#sideNav').css('margin-top', 0);
	         }
	       });
	   });
	</script>
</xen:if>

modification.description: Applies template modifications for various style properties.
modification.replace:
<xen:if is="{$googleFonts}"><link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family={$googleFonts}' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'></xen:if>
	${1}<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_favIcon}"><link rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" href="{xen:property gen_favIcon}" /></xen:if>
	${2}

modification.description: Adds top chooser to style property list.
Adds top chooser to template list.

phrases.phrase: Default to Add-on Chooser for Admin Style Properties
Default to Add-on Chooser for Admin Template Modifications
Default to Add-on Chooser for Admin Templates
Default to Add-on Chooser for Email Template Modifications
Default to Add-on Chooser for Style Properties
Default to Add-on Chooser for Template Modifications
Default to Add-on Chooser for Templates
Disabling this option will stop any tabs from appearing as selected.
Additional XenForo CSS templates to include on every page (do not include .css extension). Enter one template name on each line.
Additional JavaScript files to include on every page. Enter one filename on each line.
This path represents either the relative or absolute path to the icon you want browsers to display for this site.
Enabling this option will make the header bar float when the page is scrolled.
Enabling this option will make the login bar float when the page is scrolled.
Enabling this option will make the logo block float when the page is scrolled.
Enabling this option will make the moderator bar float when the page is scrolled.
If not set to 16px, all text set to 16px/12pt will be set to the value specified here.
If not set to 13px, all text that was previously set to 13px will be set to the value specified here.
If not set to 9px, all text that was previously set to 9px will be set to the value specified here.
If not set to 10px, all text that was previously set to 10px will be set to the value specified here.
If not set to 12px, all text that was previously set to 12px will be set to the value specified here.
If not set to 15px, all text that was previously set to 15px will be set to the value specified here.
If not set to 18px, all text that was previously set to 18px will be set to the value specified here.
If not set to 22px, all text that was previously set to 22px will be set to the value specified here.
If not set to 26px, all text that was previously set to 26px will be set to the value specified here.
If not set to 11px, all text that was previously set to 11px will be set to the value specified here.
Enabling this option will extend the footer the full width of the page.
Enter one font name per line. For multiple font weights, enter the weights after a colon, separated by a comma (e.g. "Open Sans:400,700").
This is the name of the SVG template for the main logo image used in the header of all pages.
Enabling this property will keep tab links below the logo when logo is not full width. This option is ignored if the logo is full width.
Enter the width in pixels that you would like to reserve for the logo in the header. Set to 100% if you want the navigation bar to be underneath the logo.
This controls the appearance of the last post avatar image.
This controls the appearance of the last post avatar image.
If enabled, the avatar of the last poster will be displayed alongside the last post details.
If enabled, the avatar of the last poster will be displayed alongside the last post details.
Enabling this option will show the logged in user's avatar on the account tab.
Enabling this option will show the logged in user's avatar on the account tab.
If enabled, the board title will be shown on the forum list page.

property.title: CSS templates
property.description: Additional XenForo CSS templates to include on every page (do not include .css extension). Enter one template name on each line.

property.title: Show last post avatar
property.description: If enabled, the avatar of the last poster will be displayed alongside the last post details.

property.title: JavaScript files
property.description: Additional JavaScript files to include on every page. Enter one filename on each line.

property.title: Show title on forum list
property.description: If enabled, the board title will be shown on the forum list page.

property.title: Favicon path
property.description: This path represents either the relative or absolute path to the icon you want browsers to display for this site.

property.title: Fixed header
property.description: Enabling this option will make the header bar float when the page is scrolled.

property.title: Fixed login bar
property.description: Enabling this option will make the login bar float when the page is scrolled.

property.title: Fixed moderator bar
property.description: Enabling this option will make the moderator bar float when the page is scrolled.

property.title: Show last post avatar
property.description: If enabled, the avatar of the last poster will be displayed alongside the last post details.

property.title: Last Post Avatar
property.description: This controls the appearance of the last post avatar image.

property.title: Last Post Avatar
property.description: This controls the appearance of the last post avatar image.

property.title: Fixed logo block
property.description: Enabling this option will make the logo block float when the page is scrolled.

property.title: Show avatar on account tab
property.description: Enabling this option will show the logged in user's avatar on the account tab.

property.title: Account Tab Avatar Height
property.description: Enabling this option will show the logged in user's avatar on the account tab.

property.title: Google Fonts
property.description: Enter one font name per line. For multiple font weights, enter the weights after a colon, separated by a comma (e.g. "Open Sans:400,700").

property.title: Font Size 1
property.description: If not set to 9px, all text that was previously set to 9px will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Font Size 2
property.description: If not set to 10px, all text that was previously set to 10px will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Font Size 3
property.description: If not set to 12px, all text that was previously set to 12px will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Font Size 4
property.description: If not set to 15px, all text that was previously set to 15px will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Font Size 5
property.description: If not set to 18px, all text that was previously set to 18px will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Font Size 6
property.description: If not set to 22px, all text that was previously set to 22px will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Font Size 7
property.description: If not set to 26px, all text that was previously set to 26px will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Font Small
property.description: If not set to 11px, all text that was previously set to 11px will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Font Medium
property.description: If not set to 13px, all text that was previously set to 13px will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Font Large
property.description: If not set to 16px, all text set to 16px/12pt will be set to the value specified here.

property.title: Header Logo Image SVG Template
property.description: This is the name of the SVG template for the main logo image used in the header of all pages.

property.title: Width of Header Logo
property.description: Enter the width in pixels that you would like to reserve for the logo in the header. Set to 100% if you want the navigation bar to be underneath the logo.

property.title: Tab Links Below Logo
property.description: Enabling this property will keep tab links below the logo when logo is not full width. This option is ignored if the logo is full width.

property.title: Full Width Footer
property.description: Enabling this option will extend the footer the full width of the page.

property.title: Contact Us Position
Select Active Navigation Tab
property.description: Disabling this option will stop any tabs from appearing as selected.

property.title: Public Tabs Location
Visitor Tabs Location
Sidebar Location
Search Bar Location
Tab Links Location

templates.template:
<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_fontMedium} != '13px'">
body {
	font-size: 13px;
}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_fixedHeader}">
#headerMover #header.fixed {
	position: fixed;
	z-index: 60;
}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_fixedLoginBar}">
#loginBar.fixed {
	position: fixed;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 60;
}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_fixedModeratorBar}">
#moderatorBar.fixed {
	position: fixed;
	width: 100%;
	z-index: 1;
	z-index: 60;
}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_navigationVisitorTabAvatar}">
	.accountUsername .avatar img {
		height: {xen:property gen_navigationVisitorTabAvatarHeight};
		margin-bottom: {xen:calc '-{xen:property gen_navigationVisitorTabAvatarHeight} / 2'}px;
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_headerLogoWidth} != '100%'">
	<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_headerLogoTabLinksBelow}">
		#headerMover #headerProxy
		{
			height: {xen:calc '{xen:property headerLogoHeight} + {xen:property headerTabHeight} + 2'}px; /* +2 borders */
		}
		
		.navTabs
		{
			margin-top: {xen:calc '-{xen:property headerTabHeight}'}px;
			margin-left: {xen:property gen_headerLogoWidth};
		}
	<xen:else />
		#headerMover #headerProxy
		{
			height: {xen:property headerLogoHeight}; /* +2 borders */
		}
				
		#navigation .pageContent
		{
			margin-top: {xen:calc '-{xen:property headerTabHeight} * 2 - 2'}px;
			margin-left: {xen:property gen_headerLogoWidth};
		}
	</xen:if>
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_footerLinksPosition} == 'middle'">
	.footerLinks li
	{
		float: none;
		display: inline-block;
	}
	
	.footerLinks
	{
		float: none;
		text-align: center;
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_footerFullWidth}">
	.footer
	{
		{xen:property footer}
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_topBorder}">
	#headerMover #headerProxy, #header
	{
		{xen:property gen_topBorder}
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_logoBlockContainer}">
	#header #logoBlock .pageWidth .pageContent
	{
		{xen:property gen_logoBlockContainer}
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_navLinkPopUpClosed}">
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .navLink
	{
		{xen:property gen_navLinkPopUpClosed}
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_navLinkPopUpClosedHover}">
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed .navLink:hover
	{
		{xen:property gen_navLinkPopUpClosedHover}
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_navTabPopUpClosedHover}">
	.navTabs .navTab.PopupClosed:hover
	{
		background-color: none;
		{xen:property gen_navTabPopUpClosedHover}
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_publicTabsLocation} == 'right'">
	.navTabs .publicTabs {
		float: right;
	}
<xen:elseif is="{xen:property gen_publicTabsLocation} == 'none'" />
	.navTabs .publicTabs {
		display: none;
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_visitorTabsLocation} == 'left'">
	.navTabs .visitorTabs {
		float: left;
	}
<xen:elseif is="{xen:property gen_visitorTabsLocation} == 'none'" />
	.navTabs .visitorTabs {
		display: none;
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_searchBarLocation} == 'left'">
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder, #QuickSearch {
		right: initial;
		left: 25px;
	}
	.withSearch .navTabs .navTab.selected .blockLinksList {
		margin-right: 8px;
		margin-left: 275px;
	}
<xen:elseif is="{xen:property gen_searchBarLocation} == 'none'" />
	#QuickSearchPlaceholder {
		display: none;
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_tabLinksLocation} == 'right'">
	.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks li {
		float: right;
	}
<xen:elseif is="{xen:property gen_tabLinksLocation} == 'none'" />
	.navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks {
		display: none;
	}
</xen:if>

/* Sidebar */

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_sidebarLocation} == 'left'">
	.sidebar {
		float: left;
	}
	
	.mainContainer
	{
		 float: right;
		 margin-right: 0;
		 margin-left: -{xen:calc '{xen:property sidebar.width} + 10'}px;
	}

	.mainContent
	{
		margin-right: 0;
		margin-left: {xen:calc '{xen:property sidebar.width} + 10'}px;
	}
<xen:elseif is="{xen:property gen_sidebarLocation} == 'none'" />
	.sidebar {
		display: none;
	}
	
	.mainContainer
	{
		 margin-right: 0;
		 margin-left: 0;
	}

	.mainContent
	{
		margin-right: 0;
		margin-left: 0;
	}
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_lastPostAvatar} && !{$category.privateInfo} && {$category.lastPost.date}"> <xen:require css="gen_lastpostavatar.css" /> <xen:avatar user="$category.lastPost" size="s" img="true" /> </xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_lastPostAvatar} && !{$forum.privateInfo} && {$forum.lastPost.date}"> <xen:require css="gen_lastpostavatar.css" /> <xen:avatar user="$forum.lastPost" size="s" img="true" /> </xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_lastPostAvatar} && !{$library.privateInfo} && {$library.lastArticlePage.date}"> <xen:require css="gen_lastpostavatar.css" /> <xen:avatar user="$library.lastArticlePage" size="s" img="true" /> </xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_lastPostAvatarThreadList}"> <xen:require css="gen_lastpostavatar.css" /> <xen:if is="is_array({$thread.lastPostInfo})"> <xen:avatar user="$thread.lastPostInfo" size="s" img="true" /> </xen:if> </xen:if>

modification.description: Remove forum list title if required by style properties.
Adds fixed navigation Javascript to header.
modification.replace:
<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_fixedHeader}">
	<script>
	   jQuery(document).ready(function($){
	      function scrollIfAnchor(href) {
	         href = typeof(href) == "string" ? href : $(this).attr("href");
	         if(!href) return;
	         var fromTop = $('#content').offset().top;
	         var $target = $(href);
	         if($target.length) {
	            $('html, body').animate({ scrollTop: $target.offset().top - fromTop });
	         }
	      }    
	
	      scrollIfAnchor(window.location.hash);
	      $("body").on("click", "a[href^='#']", scrollIfAnchor);
	   });
	</script>
	<xen:if is="{$visitor.user_id}">
		<xen:set var="$barId">moderatorBar</xen:set>
	<xen:else />
		<xen:set var="$barId">loginBar</xen:set>
	</xen:if>
	<xen:if is="({$visitor.user_id} && {xen:property gen_fixedModeratorBar}) || (!{$visitor.user_id} && {xen:property gen_fixedLoginBar})">
		<script>
		   jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		      $('#header').addClass('fixed');
		      $('#{$barId}').addClass('fixed');
		      $('#header').css('top', $('#{$barId}').outerHeight() + "px");
		      $('#headerProxy').css('padding-top', $('#{$barId}').outerHeight() + "px");
		   });
		</script>
	<xen:else />
		<script>
		   jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		      $(window).bind('scroll', function() {
		         var navHeight = ($(window).scrollTop());
		         if (navHeight > $('#{$barId}').outerHeight()) {
		            $('#header').addClass('fixed');
		         } else {
		            $('#header').removeClass('fixed');
		         }
		       });
		   });
		</script>
	</xen:if>
	<xen:if is="!{xen:property gen_fixedLogoBlock}">
		<script>
		   jQuery(document).ready(function($){
		      $(window).bind('scroll', function() {
		         var navHeight = ($(window).scrollTop());
		         var logoHeight = $('#logo').height();
		         $('#logoBlock').css('margin-bottom', -Math.min(logoHeight, navHeight) + "px");
		       });
		   });
		</script>
	</xen:if>
</xen:if>

modification.description: Adds last poster's avatar to the last post information in the forum node information.
Adds avatar to navigation visitor tab.
modification.replace: ${0}{xen:if {xen:property gen_navigationVisitorTabAvatar}, ' '}

modification.description: Adds last poster's avatar to the last post information in the category node information.
Adds last poster's avatar to the last post information in the forum node information.
Adds last poster's avatar to the last post information in the social category node information.
Applies template modifications for various style properties.
modification.replace:
<xen:if is="{$googleFonts}"><link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family={$googleFonts}' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'></xen:if>
	${1}<xen:if is="{xen:property gen_favIcon}"><link rel="icon" type="image/x-icon" href="{xen:property gen_favIcon}" /></xen:if>
	${2}

modification.description: Adds last poster's avatar to the last post information in the social forum node information.
Adds last poster's avatar to the last post information in the thread list item.
